full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'GO BA'I LHA LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES 'GO BA'I LHA LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD JI LTAR BYA BA'I TSUL 'DI YANG DZA SAG MGON PO SKYABS NAS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS BSKUL BA LTAR YIG GZHI MA RNYID PA ZHIG KHYER BYUNG BA DE DAG LA GZHI MA BYAS SAR RTZOM 'GA' ZHIG GIS KHA BSKANGS TE, ^GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS GZIMS CHUNG BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR 'DZAM GLING RGYAN DU BYON, , LEGS SO, ,SHIS BRJOD NI,) BLTAS PA TZAM GYIS SRID GSUM @016B ZIL GYI GNON, DREGS PA TZAM GYIS SDE BRGYAD BRAN DU 'KHOL, ,BSAM PA TZAM GYIS DNGOS GRUB CHAR LTAR 'PHEL, ,AO RGYAN BRGYUD PAR BCAS PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG ,LUS DANG GRIB MA BZHIN DU NYIN MTSAN KUN, ,'BRAL MED BSRUNG BA 'GO BA'I LHA LNGA SOGS, ,TING 'DZIN BAN BON CHOS SKYONG BSRUNG TSOGS KYIS, ,BDE SKYED DPAL LA ROL PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,,DGE'O,, (DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, BKRA SHIS BAR GYUR CIG ,)@017A *, ,BSOD NAMS DAR RGYAS RI RGYAL LHUN PO BZHIN, ,SNYAN GRAGS CHEN PO NAM MKHA' BZHIN DU KHYAB, ,TSE RING NAD MED GZHAN DON LHUN GYIS GRUB, ,YON TAN RGYA MTSO MCHOG GI BKRA SHIS SHOG ,'BAD DANG STZOL BA MA DGOS PA'I, ,YID BZHIN NOR BU DPAG BSAM SHING, ,SEMS CAN RE BA BSKONGS MDZAD PA'I, ,BSAM PA GRUB PA'I BKRA SHIS SHOG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm SHU BHAm DZA YANTU,,
